mapper.select: select MEMBER_NUM AS memberNum, MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, MEMBER_PW AS memberPw, MEMBER_ADDR AS memberAddr, MEMBER_ADDR_DETAIL AS memberAddrDetail, MEMBER_POST AS memberPost, MEMBER_REGIST AS memberRegist, GENDER AS gender, MEMBER_PHONE1 AS memberPhone1, MEMBER_PHONE2 AS memberPhone2, MEMBER_EMAIL AS memberEmail, MEMBER_BIRTH AS memberBirth, MEMBER_POINT AS memberPoint from members where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update members set MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, MEMBER_ADDR = #{memberAddr}, MEMBER_ADDR_DETAIL = #{memberAddrDetail}, MEMBER_POST = #{memberPost}, GENDER = #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_PHONE1 = #{memberPhone1}, MEMBER_PHONE2 = #{memberPhone2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}, MEMBER_BIRTH = #{memberBirth, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
